column2: this place satisfies. A girlfriend and I went and got their Houston Restaurant Weeks menu last night. We met at the bar and had a drink there before going to our table. The service
column3: from the host staff to the bar to the table was consistently excellent and friendly
column5: just a happy sort of excellent. For each course
column7: so we could sample more of the menu
column8: and there was nothing...not one thing...that wasn't excellent. They confirmed that we were there for HRW when they called to confirm the reservation
column9: but we had to ask for the menu when we got there. Someone dropped the ball
column10: but our server quickly recovered it.
